articles.author: Siobhan Robbins
articles.title: Refugee trying to reach Europe shot near Bulgaria-Turkey border - Sky News
articles.content:
Bulgaria has been accused of shooting a refugee after a new video emerged showing a young Syrian man being fired at on the border with Turkey.
It is the first footage of an asylum seeker being hit w… [+6691 chars]

articles.title: Stormers have Damian and Kitsie back for exciting if somewhat daunting French debut - News24
articles.description: The influential Springbok duo of Steven Kitshoff and Damian Willemse will bolster the Stormers ahead of their daunting if exciting debut in the European Champions Cup against Clermont on Saturday.
